animatronics

Class SerialPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • animatronics.Player
      • animatronics.SerialPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SerialPlayer
extends Player
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The SerialPlayer class controls one serial motor and send the signals for movement based on the given input array. It is synchronized through the given CyclicBarrier.
    Author:
    Jared Cline

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SerialPlayer(jssc.SerialPort serialPort, byte cardPortNum, byte[] movements, java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier barrier)
      Creates a SerialPlayer based on the given parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialPlayer

        public SerialPlayer(jssc.SerialPort serialPort,
            byte cardPortNum,
            byte[] movements,
            java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier barrier)
        Creates a SerialPlayer based on the given parameters
        Parameters:
        cardPortNum - the number of the motor's port on the controller card
        movements - a sequential array of the motor's positions during the show
        barrier - the CyclicBarrier used to synchronize all of the output threads
